title: Ranked is too much rng
body: Riot please reformat ranked system. 6 games in one day. 3 wins 3 losses...3 losses from ragers afkers. Feeders. Thousands with same story. It isnt satisfying and it doesnt respect my time spent trying to win. Fix it for your majority who support you, you guys need to pull ur heads out.

replies.body:
alot of the community are more or less casual players
(REEEEE meme insert) 
and playing ranked or infact any game competitively will have its downsides.
there is no way for riot to prevent AFK in ranked or any games.
play flex and queue with your friends, thats the only way to get rid of the rng
Yeah....RNG in your favor.  If you are not one of those ragers afkers feeders, then 4 chances you have one on your team and 5 chances you have one on the enemy team
